reviewtext: This is one of the finest `nine-inch' TVs from Sony. All Sony's 9inch TV sets have very sharp and crisp images. Sony's Dynamic Picture Processor and Automatic White Balance increases picture fidelity. However, the fact alone that this is a 9" inch set means that the electron gun has a very short distance to aim and deliver a precise image against the phosphor screen. The closer the electron gun is to the back of the tube's screen almost always guarantees a good picture. This picture is exceptionally crisp and sharp resulting in incredible fidelity.
